title: DYNASTY WARRIORS 8: Xtreme Legends Complete Edition
notes: Cinematics must be disabled in config app
"Play Movie" must be set to "off" in the game configuration utility, otherwise game will not load. When using an Xbox One controller, the camera constantly spins counter-clockwise.
